recipes.name: Cheddar & Mixed Pepper Quesadillas
instructions: Step 1: Preheat a skillet over medium heat.
Step 2: Spread a thin layer of Hellman's mayonnaise on each tortilla.
Step 3: In a bowl, mix shredded cheddar cheese and thinly sliced mixed bell peppers.
Step 4: Place a tortilla in the skillet, and spread the cheese and pepper mixture evenly over half.
Step 5: Fold the tortilla and cook until the cheese is melted and the tortilla is golden brown, about 3-4 minutes per side.
Step 6: Serve with a dollop of Colman's mustard as a dipping sauce.

recipes.name: Wasabi & Harissa Slaw
instructions: Step 1: Shred the red cabbage and carrots into a mixing bowl.
Step 2: Chop pickles and add them to the bowl.
Step 3: In a separate small bowl, mix Yokki wasabi paste, Roland harissa paste, and Hellman's mayonnaise to create the dressing.
Step 4: Pour the dressing over the shredded vegetables and toss until well combined.
Step 5: Chill the slaw in the refrigerator for 20 minutes before serving.

recipes.name: Arugula & Parsley Pesto Pasta
instructions: Step 1: In a food processor, blend fresh arugula, parsley, and sunflower seeds.
Step 2: Gradually add melted Land O'Lakes butter while blending until smooth.
Step 3: Add grated parmesan cheese and pulse until just combined.
Step 4: In a large pot, cook pasta according to package instructions.
Step 5: Drain pasta and mix with the arugula-parsley pesto.
Step 6: Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Apple & Almond Salad
instructions: Step 1: In a large bowl, combine mixed salad greens.
Step 2: Thinly slice apples and add them to the bowl.
Step 3: Add almonds and toss to combine.
Step 4: Squeeze fresh lemon juice over the salad.
Step 5: Drizzle Annie's dressing over the top and serve.

recipes.name: Cheese & Pickle Stuffed Tortilla Rolls
instructions: Step 1: Spread Philadelphia cream cheese over the surface of each tortilla.
Step 2: Thinly slice pickles and arrange them evenly on top of the cream cheese.
Step 3: Sprinkle fresh mint leaves and shredded cheddar cheese over the pickles.
Step 4: Roll the tortillas tightly and slice each roll into 3-4 pieces.
Step 5: Serve immediately or chill for later.

recipes.name: Maple Drizzled Fruit Platter
instructions: Step 1: Slice apples, pears, and bananas into bite-size pieces.
Step 2: Arrange the fruit on a serving platter.
Step 3: Squeeze fresh lime juice over the fruit to prevent browning.
Step 4: Drizzle maple syrup over the fruit.
Step 5: Sprinkle sunflower seeds on top for added crunch.

recipes.name: Beet & Carrot Spicy Bite
instructions: Step 1: Slice marinated beets and set aside.
Step 2: Grate carrots and mix with Roland harissa paste.
Step 3: On a serving platter, place slices of beets in a circle.
Step 4: Top each beet slice with a spoonful of the spicy carrot mixture.
Step 5: Garnish with crumbled feta cheese and fresh mint leaves.
